mapper.insert: insert into T_APPEAL (URID, APPEALTYPEID, APPEALPERSON, APPEALDATE, RESPONDENT, ARBITRATOR, TITLE, CONTENT, NODECODE, DEALRESULT, ISACTIVE, CREATEDON, CREATEDBY, LASTMODIFIEDON, LASTMODIFIEDBY, ROWVERSION, DESCRIPTION) values (#{urid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appealtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appealdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{respondent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arbitrator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastmodifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmodifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowversion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_APPEAL
APPEALTYPEID = #{appealtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPEALPERSON = #{appealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPEALDATE = #{appealdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESPONDENT = #{respondent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARBITRATOR = #{arbitrator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODECODE = #{nodecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALRESULT = #{dealresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFIEDON = #{lastmodifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMODIFIEDBY = #{lastmodifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROWVERSION = #{rowversion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where URID = #{urid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_APPEAL set APPEALTYPEID = #{appealtypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPEALPERSON = #{appealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPEALDATE = #{appealdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESPONDENT = #{respondent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARBITRATOR = #{arbitrator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODECODE = #{nodecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALRESULT = #{dealresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTMODIFIEDON = #{lastmodifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMODIFIEDBY = #{lastmodifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROWVERSION = #{rowversion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where URID = #{urid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from T_APPEAL t,T_APPEALTYPE a,TDICTIONARY d,tsys_organization o,tsys_organization o1 where d.L_KEYNO = '9999078' and t.dealresult = d.C_KEYVALUE and t.APPEALTYPEID = a.URID and t.appealperson = o.ORG_ID and t.respondent = o1.ORG_ID
and to_char(t.appealdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{appealdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.title like concat('%',concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
ORDER BY t.CREATEDON desc
